name: Ti' Punch
instructions: With a sharp paring knife, cut a disc of skin from the lime about the size of a silver dollar, taking as little of the pith and actual fruit as possible
In a rocks glass, muddle the lime disk with cane or simple syrup
Note: While ice is not traditionally used in the Ti' Punch—on the islands, it is considered sacrilege—if adding a few cubes makes it easier for you to enjoy, go for it
